title: Plutus core
description: The programming language in which scripts on the Cardano blockchain are written.

props.body: The programming language in which scripts on the Cardano blockchain are written. Plutus Core is a small functional programming language — a formal specification is available with further details. Plutus Core is not read or written by humans, it is a compilation target for other languages. [What is plutus core?](https://docs.cardano.org/projects/plutus/en/terms/latest/plutus/explanations/plutus-foundation.html#what-is-plutus-foundation)
